SEARCH
Module FoundationsF25_2
Package database

Class Database

java.lang.Object
database.Database
public class Database extends Object

Title: Database Class.

Description: This is an in-memory database built on H2. Detailed documentation of H2 can be found at https://www.h2database.com/html/main.html (Click on "PDF (2MP) for a PDF of 438 pages on the H2 main page.) This class leverages H2 and provides numerous special supporting methods.

Copyright: Lynn Robert Carter Â© 2025

Version:
2.00 2025-04-29 Updated and expanded from the version produce by on a previous version by Pravalika Mukkiri and Ishwarya Hidkimath Basavaraj
Author:
Lynn Robert Carter

  • Method Details

    • connectToDatabase

      public void connectToDatabase() throws SQLException

      Method: connectToDatabase

      Description: Used to establish the in-memory instance of the H2 database from secondary storage.

      Throws:
      SQLException - when the DriverManager is unable to establish a connection

    • createTables

      private void createTables() throws SQLException

      Method: createTables

      Description: Used to create new instances of the two database tables used by this class.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if issue occurred

    • isDatabaseEmpty

      public boolean isDatabaseEmpty()

      Method: isDatabaseEmpty

      Description: If the user database has no rows, true is returned, else false.

      Returns:
      true if the database is empty, else it returns false

    • getNumberOfUsers

      public int getNumberOfUsers()

      Method: getNumberOfUsers

      Description: Returns an integer .of the number of users currently in the user database.

      Returns:
      the number of user records in the database.

    • register

      public void register(User user) throws SQLException

      Method: register(User user)

      Description: Creates a new row in the database using the user parameter.

      Parameters:
      user - specifies a user object to be added to the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - when there is an issue creating the SQL command or executing it.

    • getUserList

      public List<String> getUserList()

      Method: List getUserList()

      Description: Generate an List of Strings, one for each user in the database, starting with "Select User" at the start of the list.

      Returns:
      a list of userNames found in the database.

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers()

      Method: getAllUsers()

      Description: Generate an List of Strings includes all data from all users.

      Returns:
      a list of all users data.

    • getAllStudents

      public List<User> getAllStudents()

      Method: getAllStudents()

      Description: Retrieves all users who have the student role from the userDB table.

      Returns:
      a List of User objects representing all students; returns an empty list if no students exist or if a database error occurs

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(String userName)

      Method: deleteUser()

      Description: delete a user by username from the database.

      Parameters:
      userName - input from dialog

    • loginAdmin

      public boolean loginAdmin(User user)

      Method: boolean loginAdmin(User user)

      Description: Check to see that a user with the specified username, password, and role is the same as a row in the table for the username, password, and role.

      Parameters:
      user - specifies the specific user that should be logged in playing the Admin role.
      Returns:
      true if the specified user has been logged in as an Admin else false.

    • loginStudent

      public boolean loginStudent(User user)

      Method: boolean loginStudent(User user)

      Description: Check to see that a user with the specified username, password, and role is the same as a row in the table for the username, password, and role.

      Parameters:
      user - specifies the specific user that should be logged in playing the Student role.
      Returns:
      true if the specified user has been logged in as an Student else false.

    • loginStaff

      public boolean loginStaff(User user)

      Method: boolean loginStaff(User user)

      Description: Check to see that a user with the specified username, password, and role is the same as a row in the table for the username, password, and role.

      Parameters:
      user - specifies the specific user that should be logged in playing the Reviewer role.
      Returns:
      true if the specified user has been logged in as an Student else false.

    • doesUserExist

      public boolean doesUserExist(String userName)

      Method: boolean doesUserExist(User user)

      Description: Check to see that a user with the specified username is in the table.

      Parameters:
      userName - specifies the specific user that we want to determine if it is in the table.
      Returns:
      true if the specified user is in the table else false.

    • updatePassword

      public boolean updatePassword(String username, String newPassword)

      Method: updatePassword(String username, String newPassword)

      Description: Update the password by username in the database.

      Parameters:
      username - specifies the specific user that we want to change password if it is in the table.
      newPassword - specifies the new password to replace the old password.
      Returns:
      true if the password is successfully updated

    • getNumberOfRoles

      public int getNumberOfRoles(User user)

      Method: int getNumberOfRoles(User user)

      Description: Determine the number of roles a specified user plays.

      Parameters:
      user - specifies the specific user that we want to determine if it is in the table.
      Returns:
      the number of roles this user plays (0 - 5).

    • generateInvitationCode

      public String generateInvitationCode(String emailAddress, String role)

      Method: String generateInvitationCode(String emailAddress, String role)

      Description: Given an email address and a roles, this method establishes and invitation code and adds a record to the InvitationCodes table. When the invitation code is used, the stored email address is used to establish the new user and the record is removed from the table.

      Parameters:
      emailAddress - specifies the email address for this new user.
      role - specified the role that this new user will play.
      Returns:
      the code of six characters so the new user can use it to securely setup an account.

    • getAllInvitationEmails

      public ArrayList<String> getAllInvitationEmails()

      Method: getAllInvitationEmails()

      Description: Return all emails from the invitation table to help to show the invitation table in admin home.

      Returns:
      the list of emails that received and not yet used the invitation code.

      Method: int getNumberOfInvitations()

      Description: Determine the number of outstanding invitations in the table.

      Returns:
      the number of invitations in the table.

      Description: Determine if an email address has been user to establish a user.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • registerOneTimePasscodeRequest

      public void registerOneTimePasscodeRequest(String emailAddress)

      Method: registerOneTimePasscodeRequest(String emailAddress)

      Description: create a new entry in the one-time password table by only giving the email with empty password.

      Parameters:
      emailAddress - is the email address been sent the one-time password

    • generateAndUpdatePasscode

      public String generateAndUpdatePasscode(String emailAddress)

      Method: generateAndUpdatePasscode(String emailAddress)

      Description: generate and update the one-time password if the admin send it to the specific email.

      Parameters:
      emailAddress - is the email address needs to receive the one-time password
      Returns:
      the string of one-time password made of uppercase letters and numbers in 10-digit

    • getAllOneTimePasscodeEntries

      public Map<String,String> getAllOneTimePasscodeEntries()

      Method: getAllOneTimePasscodeEntries()

      Description: Retrieves all one-time passcode entries from the OneTimePasscodes table.

      Returns:
      a Map where the keys are email addresses and the values are the associated passcodes; returns an empty map if no entries exist or if a database error occurs

    • getEmailsWithoutPasscode

      public ArrayList<String> getEmailsWithoutPasscode()

      Method: getEmailsWithoutPasscode()

      Description: provide the list of emails that needs one-time password.

      Returns:
      the list of emails that doesn't receive the one-time password yet.

    • getPasscodeByEmail

      public String getPasscodeByEmail(String email)

      Method: getPasscodeByEmail(String email)

      Description: retrieve the passcode associated with the given email from the OneTimePasscodes table. Returns "" if none exists.

      Parameters:
      email - the email whose passcode should be retrieved
      Returns:
      the corresponding passcode, or "" if none exists

    • removePasscodeRowByEmail

      public void removePasscodeRowByEmail(String email)

      Method: removePasscodeRowByEmail(String email)

      Description: Deletes a one-time passcode entry for a specific email address.

      Parameters:
      email - the email address whose passcode entry should be removed

    • emailaddressHasBeenSentPasscode

      public boolean emailaddressHasBeenSentPasscode(String emailAddress)

      Method: emailaddressHasBeenSentPasscode(String emailAddress)

      Description: check if the email address has been sent a one-time password, so it can be removed from the one-time password request table in admin home.

      Parameters:
      emailAddress - the email that needs to be checked with corresponding non-empty passcode
      Returns:
      true is the email has a corresponding non-empty string of one-time password on the table

    • removeExpiredEntries

      public void removeExpiredEntries()

      Method: removeExpiredEntries()

      Description: Removes all invitation codes and one-time passcodes that are older than 24 hours. This cleanup ensures that expired authentication data does not remain in the database and prevents outdated credentials from being used.

    • getStudentStatus

      public StudentStatus getStudentStatus(String userName)

      Method: StudentStatus getStudentStatus(String userName)

      Description: Retrieves the student status by username. If the student status does not exist, a new record is inserted with default values.

      Parameters:
      userName - the username of the student
      Returns:
      the StudentStatus object, or null if a database error occurs

    • makeMessage

      public int makeMessage(Message msg)

      Method: int makeMessage(Message msg)

      Description: Inserts a new message into the Message table.

      Parameters:
      msg - the Message object to insert
      Returns:
      the generated ID of the inserted message, or -1 if insertion fails

    • deleteStudentStatus

      public void deleteStudentStatus(String userName) throws SQLException

      Method: void deleteStudentStatus(String userName)

      Description: Deletes the student status record for the specified username from the StudentStatus table. This is useful for test setup/cleanup or removing a student's metrics from the database.

      Parameters:
      userName - the username of the student whose status record should be deleted
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getMessage

      public Message getMessage(int msgId)

      Method: Message getMessage(int msgId)

      Description: Retrieves a message by its ID.

      Parameters:
      msgId - the unique ID of the message
      Returns:
      the Message object if found, otherwise null

    • getAllMessages

      public List<Message> getAllMessages(String username)

      Method: List getAllMessages(String username)

      Description: Retrieves all messages received by a specific user.

      Parameters:
      username - the receiver's username
      Returns:
      a list of Message objects

    • getAllUnreadMessages

      public List<Message> getAllUnreadMessages(String username)

      Method: List getAllUnreadMessages(String username)

      Description: Retrieves all unread messages received by a specific user.

      Parameters:
      username - the receiver's username
      Returns:
      a list of unread Message objects, or null if a database error occurs

    • markMessageAsRead

      public void markMessageAsRead(Message msg)

      Method: void markMessageAsRead(Message msg)

      Description: Marks a message as read in the database.

      Parameters:
      msg - the Message object to update

    • deleteMessage

      public void deleteMessage(Message msg)

      Method: void deleteMessage(Message msg)

      Description: Deletes a message from the Message table.

      Parameters:
      msg - the Message object to delete

    • clearDatabase

      public void clearDatabase() throws SQLException

      Method: void clearDatabase()

      Description: Clear the database.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if issue occurred
